koti thrasthawadingen athpath karagath wishala ayudha thogayak asthana gatha wi athi bawa mita desathiyakata prathama rajaya wisin aanawaranaya kara ganu labuwa.ehi dakwune noyekuth thrasthawadi kandayam walata mema aayudha wikuna athi bawayi.awangard nauka walin mema aayudha prawahanaya kara athi bawath wartha wanawa.kese wethath mema sathiyedi mita adala wimarshana katayuthu sadaha salawa hamuda kadawure athi aayudha thogayada wigananaya kirimata sudanamwa pawathiya.mema aayudha pramanaya adu nam aniwaryenma hitapu aarakshaka lekam waraya ath adanguwata path wanawaya.namuth eema wimarshana katayuththata prathama salawa awi gabadawa gini gaththaya.eheth me wana wita rahas polis asa hari dishawata gaman karamin atha.an kawaradakatawath wada mewara parikshana katayuthu walata rahas polisiya sambandha wiya.buddhi ansha meya dana gath wigasa ginna pilibadawa wimarshana katayuthu walata wenada men sadi pahadi sitiyeya.namuth agamathiwaraya mewara wenama thinduwak laba dunneya.enam mema ginna pilibadawa parikshana rahas polisiyata bhara karamini.me wana witath ansha kihipayak yatathe parikshana sidu wemin pawathi.
